title: Give me back my Theatre!
content:

title: Re: Give me back my Theatre!
content:
Garg, so it seems. I don't have the slightest idea. I guess we should just wait a while and see if it returns.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Give me back my Theatre!
content:
Gives me a 404 (Page not Found) from EzBoard. Damn it, this is what happens when you talk about moving to a better (free or non-free, it doesn't matter) forum hosting alternative in an EzBoard? They must hate us now.------------------------------

title: Re: Give me back my Theatre!
content:
I guess we should just wait a while and see if it returns.

One of the best arguments for hosting our own forum - if it breaks we don't have to rely on someone else to fix it...[url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/]KeenWiki[/url] | [url=http://www.shikadi.net/moddingwiki/]ModdingWiki[/url]

title: Re: Give me back my Theatre!
content:
It's been how many days now and it HASN'T returned? What is / has been done about this? Did any of the admins email EzBoard about this? What's going on?

I mean not like I'm missing anything... there really wasn't anything good in "Theatre" at all to begin with. But it's still annoying that it doesn't work.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.
